task.title: Write BDD scenarios in Jira tickets

taskbody.context: With the newly added BDD custom fields, you can now write BDD scenarios in Jira tickets. To do so, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Click More (...), select Katalon BDD Fields.
To edit content in Katalon BDD Field, click Edit (pencil icon) and write a Gherkin content. Make sure the content starts with Feature.

image.alt: Write BDD scenarios in Jira tickets

taskbody.result: You have successfully created a BDD test case in Jira.
taskbody.postreq: Next, to import BDD test cases for execution in , you need to configure Jira integration in .
